function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resuspension of viral particles due to natural and mechanical airflow patterns in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to viral particles for individuals in the built environment","Mitigation":"Use of air filtration systems and regular cleaning of surfaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, UV-C light disinfection","People":"Individuals in the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Transfer of viruses from individuals to surfaces and vice versa through contact","Impact":"Potential for transmission and contamination of surfaces in the built environment","Mitigation":"Frequent hand hygiene, use of disinfectants on surfaces","Technologies":"Alcohol-based sanitizers, disinfectant sprays","People":"Individuals in the built environment","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners"},{"Description":"Contamination of fomites with SARS-CoV-2 particles from infected individuals and bodily secretions","Impact":"Risk of viral transmission via fomite contact in the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of high-touch surfaces, use of protective barriers","Technologies":"Antimicrobial surface coatings, self-disinfecting materials","People":"Individuals in the built environment","Owner":"Cleaning staff, facility managers"}]}
